text: Ian Robert Twitchin (22 January 1952 â€“ 3 December 2017) was an English footballer. He played as a right back and midfielder. He spent his entire professional career with Torquay United, making 401 appearances in The Football League. He later played for Minehead and Newton Abbot Spurs (where he was player-manager). He was born in Teignmouth, Devon. Twitchin died on 3 December 2017, at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2017 deaths Category:English footballers Category:English football managers Category:Sportspeople from Devon
title: Ian Twitchin
